'''Cresses''' were a type of plant, that grew along streams in [[Rohan]].<ref>{{Cite DTP|LR 3.02.027}}</ref>
==Inspiration==
The specific cress encountered in Rohan was likely watercress.<ref name=flora>Walter S. Judd & Graham A. Judd (2017), ''[[Flora of Middle-Earth|Flora of Middle-Earth: Plants of J.R.R. Tolkien's Legendarium]]'', p. 128</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1984-1997: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]''''' 
:'''''Golden Cress''''' ([[Sindarin|S.]] ''Melbis'', [[Quenya|Q.]] ''Malquessi''), also known as ''Gold Chute'', was a fernlike riverside herb, found almost exclusively in the Vale of [[Erech]] and [[Blackroot Vale]]. Prepared into ointment, it helped heal bleeding wounds. <ref>{{ICE|2010}}, p. 175</ref><ref>{{ICE|2026}}, pp. 106-107</ref>
